reward.name: Azorius Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell immobilitzar humanoide} (3rd-level version), {@spell command}, o {@spell contraconjur} spell. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Blessing of Health
entries: Your Constitució score increases by 2, up to a maximum of 22.

reward.name: Blessing of Magic Resistència
entries: Tens avantatge a tirades de salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

reward.name: Blessing of Protection
entries: Tens +1 a la CA and saving throws.

reward.name: Blessing of Understanding
entries: Your Saviesa score increases by 2, up to a maximum of 22.

reward.name: Blessing of Valhalla
entries: This blessing grants you the power to summon spirit warriors, as if you had blown a {@item horn of valhalla, silver||silver horn of Valhalla}. Once you use this blessing, you can't use it again until 7 days have passed.

reward.name: Blessing of Weapon Enhancement
entries: One nonmagical weapon in your possession becomes a +1 weapon whenever you wield it.

reward.name: Blessing of Wound Closure
entries: This blessing grants you the benefits of a {@item amulet de tancar ferides}.

reward.name: Boon of Combat Prowess
entries: When you miss amb un atac armat cos a cos, you can choose a impactar instead. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Dimensional Travel
entries: Com a acció, you can cast the {@spell pas boira} spell, without using a spell slot or any components. Once you do so, you can't use this boon again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Fate
entries: When another creature que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast makes an ability check, an attack roll, or a saving throw, you can roll a {@dice d10} and apply the result as a bonus or penalty to the roll. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Fortitude
entries: Your punts de vida màxims increases by 40.

reward.name: Boon of High Magic
entries: You gain one 9th-level spell slot, provided that you already have one.

reward.name: Boon of Immortality
entries: You stop aging. You are immune to any effect that would age you, and you can't die from old age.

reward.name: Boon of Invincibility
entries: When you take damage from any source, you can reduce that damage to 0. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Irresistible Offense
entries: You can bypass the damage resistances of any creature.

reward.name: Boon of Luck
entries: You can add a {@dice d10} roll to any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw you make. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Magic Resistència
entries: Tens avantatge a tirades de salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

reward.name: Boon of Peerless Aim
entries: You can give yourself a +20 bonus to a ranged attack roll you make. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Perfect Health
entries: You are immune to all diseases and poisons, and tens avantatge a tirades de Constitució.

reward.name: Boon of Planar Travel
entries: When you gain this boon, choose a plane of existence other than the Material Plane. You can now use an action to cast the {@spell saltar de pla} spell (no spell slot or components required), targeting yourself only, and travel to the chosen plane, or from that plane back to the Material Plane. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a short rest.

reward.name: Boon of Quick Casting
entries: Choose one of your spells of 1st through 3rd level that has a casting time of 1 action. That spell's casting time is now 1 bonus action for you.

reward.name: Boon of Recovery
entries: Pots, com a acció bonus, regain a number of hit points equal to half your punts de vida màxims. Once you use this boon, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

reward.name: Resiliència Boon of
entries: Tens resistència al dany bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons.

reward.name: Boon of Skill Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency in all skills.

reward.name: Boon of Speed
entries: Your walking speed increases by 30 feet. A més, pots, com a acció bonus, take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action. Once you do so, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt.

reward.name: Boon of Spell Mastery
entries: Choose one 1st-level sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell that you can cast. You can now cast that spell at its lowest level without expending a spell slot.

reward.name: Boon of Spell Recall
entries: You can cast any spell you know or have prepared without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you can't use this boon again until you finish a long rest.

reward.name: Boon of the Fire Soul
entries: You have immunity to fire damage. You can also cast {@spell mans ardents} (save DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components.

reward.name: Boon of the Night Spirit
entries: While completely in an area of dim light or darkness, you can become {@condition invisible} as an action. You remain {@condition invisible} until you take an action or a reaction.

reward.name: Boon of the Stormborn
entries: You have immunity to lightning and thunder damage. You can also cast {@spell tronada} (save DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components.

reward.name: Boon of the Unfettered
entries: Tens avantatge a tirades de ability checks made to resist being {@condition grappled}. A més, pots, com a acció, automatically escape a grapple or free yourself of restraints of any kind.

reward.name: Boon of Truesight
entries: You have {@sense truesight} out to a range of 60 feet.

reward.name: Boon of Undetectability
entries: Tens un +10 a Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks, and you can't be detected or targeted by {@filter endevinació|spells|school=D} magic, including scrying sensors.

reward.name: Boros Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell mantell del creuat} or {@spell pressa} spell. Alternatively, you can cast the {@spell sageta guia} spell, and if it hits, you regain a number of hit points equal to the damage it deals. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Charm of Animal Conjuring
entries: This charm allows you to cast the {@spell convocar animals} spell (3rd-level version) as an action. Once used three times, the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Biting Cold
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}

This charm has 3 charges. Com a acció bonus, you can expend 1 of the charm's charges to wreathe your weapon attacks with biting cold durant 1 minut. Until this effect ends, you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de fred when you hit with a melee or atac armat a distància. Once all its charges have been expended, this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Bounty
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}

This charm has 3 charges. Com a acció, you can expend 1 of the charm's charges to cast the {@spell crear menjar i aigua} spell, sense requerir components. Once all its charges have been expended, this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Cold Resistència
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}
This charm allows you to give yourself resistance to cold damage as an action. This benefit lasts for 24 hours, after which the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Visió de Foscor
entries: This charm allows you to cast the {@spell visió de foscor} spell com a acció, no components required. Once used three times, the charm goes away.

reward.name: Charm of Feather Falling
entries: This charm grants you the benefits of a {@item ring of feather falling}. These benefits last for 10 days, after which the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Heroisme
entries: This charm allows you to give yourself the benefit of a {@item potion of heroisme} as an action. Once you do so, the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Nine Lives
entries: When you drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, you can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead. Once used nine times, the charm goes away.

reward.name: Charm of Restoration
entries: This charm has 6 charges. Pots, com a acció, expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells: {@spell restabliment superior} (4 charges) or {@spell restabliment menor} (2 charges). Once all its charges have been expended, the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Snowball Strike
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}

This charm has 5 charges. Com a acció bonus, you can expend 1 of the charm's charges to create a magical snowball in your hand and throw it. You must have a hand free to hold the snowball, or the charge is wasted. The snowball is a magic ranged weapon with which you are proficient. It has a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet, it deals {@damage 1d4} de dany de fred on a hit, and it scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20. If you score a critical hit with the snowball, the target is {@condition encegat} fins el final del seu proper torn. The snowball vanishes immediately after you hit or miss with it, or at the end of your turn if you don't throw it. Once all its charges have been expended, this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Crystal Heart
entries: This charm grants you immunity to piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, but you gain vulnerability to dany contundent. These effects last for 10 days, after which the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Ghoul
entries: This charm allows you to use an action to eat a mouthful of flesh from a humanoid that has been dead no longer than 1 day. When you do, you regain {@dice 3d8 + 3} hit points. Once used three times, the charm goes away.

reward.name: Charm of the Trol de Gel
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}

This charm allows you to use your reaction when you take cold damage to reduce the damage to 0. You regain a number of hit points equal to half the cold damage you would have taken. Once you do so, the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Maimed
entries: This charm allows you to regrow a lost appendage or organ, such as an arm, a foot, or an eye. After it is used once, the charm goes away.

reward.name: Charm of the Mirage
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|CM} living a desert by using their Magical Gift action.}
This charm allows you to cast the {@spell terreny il·lusori} spell (save DC 15) as an action. Once used, this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Slayer
entries: One sword in your possession becomes a {@item dragon slayer} or {@item giant slayer} (DM's choice) for the next 9 days. The charm then vanishes from you and the weapon returns to normal.

reward.name: Charm of the Snow Walker
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}
This charm has 3 charges. Com a acció, you can expend 1 of the charm's charges to gain the following benefits for 24 hours:

items: You and your allies within 15 feet of you ignore terreny difícil caused by snow or ice.
You can see through areas heavily obscured by snow to a distance of 60 feet.
You are immune to the effects of extreme cold, as described in the {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|DMG} (though you gain no protection from cold damage).

entries: Once all its charges have been expended, this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Storm
entries: You become charged with the power of the storm, to the extent that tiny sparks crackle in your eyes. You can cast the {@spell llampec} spell (3rd-level version) as an action. Once used three times, the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Swollen Hag
entries: This charm allows you to spit up a frog as an action. The frog understands you and obeys your commands. Once used three times, the charm goes away.

reward.name: Charm of the Traveler's Haven
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|ToA} living in Icewind Dale or other cold regions by using their Magical Gift action.}

This charm has 3 charges. Com a acció, you can expend 1 of the charm's charges to cast the {@spell Barraca Diminuta d'en Leomund} spell, no components required. Once all its charges have been expended, this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of the Water Bearer
entries: {@note This charm can be bestowed by a {@creature chwinga|CM} living a desert by using their Magical Gift action.}

This charm allows you to create up to 1 gallon of fresh water, which fills one or more empty containers in your possession. You can do this up to thrice per day for 10 days, after which this charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Treasure Sense
entries: While this charm lasts, pots, com a acció, pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 30 feet of you. The effect lasts for 3 days, after which the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Charm of Vitality
entries: This charm allows you to give yourself the benefit of a {@item potion of vitality} as an action. Once you do so, the charm vanishes from you.

reward.name: Clay No-Face's Charm
entries: While you have Clay No-Face in your possession, no necessites menjar, beure, ni respirar. These benefits last for 30 days while the doll is in your possession, after which the charm vanishes from you.
The doll is a Tiny construct. Destroying the doll causes the child's soul within it to become trapped in {@adventure the Soulmonger|ToA|5|The Soulmonger}.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Dahlver-Nar, He of the Many Teeth
entries: Dahlver-Nar's gift is the power to live many lives. Upon receiving this dark gift, the beneficiary instantly reincarnates when it dies, as though it was the target of a {@spell reencarnar} spell. The new body appears within 10 feet of the old one. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary of this dark gift loses all of its teeth until it reincarnates for the third and final time.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Delban, the Star of Ice and Hate
entries: Delban's gift is the power to unleash deadly cold. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell con de fred} spell as an action. After it has been used seven times, the dark gift vanishes. Until it vanishes, the beneficiary also gains the benefits of a {@item ring of warmth}.
The beneficiary of this dark gift gains the following flaw: "Fire terrifies me."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Drizlash, the Nine-Eyed Spider
entries: Drizlash's gift is the power to walk on walls and ceilings. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
The beneficiary of this dark gift grows an extra eye somewhere on its body. The eye is blind and ever open.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Fekre, Queen of Poxes
entries: Fekre's gift is the power of spreading disease. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell contagiar} spell as an action. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary of this dark gift reeks of filth.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Great Taar Haak, the Five-Headed Destroyer
entries: Taar Haak's gift is great strength. This dark gift grants its beneficiary the benefit of a {@item cinturó de fire giant strength}. This benefit lasts for 10 days, after which the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary of this dark gift the following flaw: "I like to bully others and make them feel weak and inferior."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Khirad, the Star of Secrets
entries: Khirad's gift is the power of divination. This gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell escodrinyar} spell as an action. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary's voice becomes a low whisper, and its smile becomes cruel and evil.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Norganas, the Finger of Oblivion
entries: Norganas's gift is the power to turn life into undeath. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell dit de la mort} spell as an action. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes. When it vanishes, the beneficiary ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, drop to 0 hit points.
This dark gift turns the beneficiary's blood pitch black and viscid, like tar.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Savnok the Inscrutible
entries: Savnok's gift is the power to shield the mind. This dark gift takes the form of a {@spell ment en blanc} spell cast on the beneficiary. The spell has an extended duration of 1 year, after which the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary's eyes melt away upon receiving this dark gift, leaving empty sockets that can still see.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Seriach, the Hell Hound Whisperer
entries: Seriach's gift is the power to summon and control hell hounds. Com a acció, the beneficiary of this dark gift can summon and control two {@creature hell hound||hell hounds}. Both hounds appear at the same time. The beneficiary can summon hounds only once, and the dark gift vanishes when they die.

The beneficiary gains the ability to speak and understand Infernal, if he or she doesn't already know the language. (The hell hounds understand no other language.) Sulfurous smoke issues from the beneficiary's pores whenever he or she speaks Infernal.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Shami-Amourae, the Lady of Delights
entries: Shami-Amourae's gift is the power of persuasion. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell suggestió} spell com a acció, and saving throws against the spell have disadvantage. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary of this dark gift gains an extra finger on each hand, as well as the following flaw: "I can't get enough pleasure. I desire others to create beauty for me at all times."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Sykane, the Soul Hungerer
entries: Sykane's gift is the power to raise the recently deceased. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell llevar als morts} spell as an action. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes.

As soon as this dark gift is received, the beneficiary's eyes glow a sickly yellow until the dark gift vanishes. The beneficiary also gains the following flaw: "If I help someone, I expect payment in return."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Tarakamedes, the Grave Wyrm
entries: Tarakamedes's gift is the power of flight. The beneficiary of this dark gift grows skeletal wings and gains una velocitat de vol de 50 peus.
The beneficiary of this dark gift must eat bones or grave dirt to survive. At dawn, if the creature has not eaten at least 1 pound of bones or grave dirt in the past 24 hours, it dies.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Vaund the Evasive
entries: Vaund's gift is the power of evasion. This dark gift grants its beneficiary the benefits of an {@item amulet protector contra detecció i localització} and a {@item ring of evasion}. These benefits last for 10 days, after which the dark gift vanishes.
The beneficiary of this dark gift becomes twitchy and nervous, and also gains the following flaw: "I can't give a straight answer to any question put to me."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Yog the Invincible
entries: Yog's gift is one of physical resilience. This dark gift increases the beneficiary's punts de vida màxims by 30. This benefit lasts for 10 days, after which the dark gift vanishes.
Oily black fur covers the beneficiary's face and body.

reward.name: Dark Gift of Yrrga, the Eye of Shadows
entries: Yrrga's gift is the power of visió veritable. This dark gift grants its beneficiary the benefits of {@sense truesight} out to a range of 60 feet. These benefits last for 30 days, after which the dark gift vanishes.

The eyes of the beneficiary become starry voids until the dark gift vanishes. The beneficiary of this dark gift also gains the following flaw: "I believe that all life is pointless and look forward to death when it finally comes."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Zantras, the Kingmaker
entries: Zantras's gift is power that comes from great presence and force of personality. This dark gift increases the beneficiary's Carisma by 4, up to a maximum of 22.
The beneficiary of this dark gift gains the following flaw: "I won't take no for an answer."

reward.name: Dark Gift of Zrin-Hala, the Howling Storm
entries: Zrin-Hala's gift is the power to create lightning. This dark gift allows its beneficiary to cast the {@spell llampec} spell as an action. After it has been used three times, the dark gift vanishes.
As soon as this dark gift is received, one side of the beneficiary's face sags and loses all feeling.

reward.name: Dimir Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell pampalluga} or {@spell adormir} (3rd-level version) spell. Alternatively, when you take damage, you can use your reaction to turn {@condition invisible} and teleport fins a 30 peus a un espai desocupat que puguis veure. You remain {@condition invisible} fins el final del teu proper torn o fins que ataquis o llancis un conjur. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Golgari Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell dissipar màgia}, {@spell pseudo vida} (3rd-level version), or {@spell núvol fètid} spell. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Gruul Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell heroisme} or {@spell tronada} spell (3rd-level versions). Alternatively, as a reaction when you miss with a weapon attack, you can make another attack against the target you missed. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host's Destresa score becomes 23, unless it is already higher.

reward.name: Izzet Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell dissipar màgia} or {@spell llampec} spell. Alternatively, com a acció, you can regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Joho's Charm
entries: While you have Joho in your possession, it grants you the benefit of a {@item helm of comprehending languages}. This benefit lasts for 7 days while the doll is in your possession, after which the charm vanishes from you.
The doll is a Tiny construct. Destroying the doll causes the child's soul within it to become trapped in {@adventure the Soulmonger|ToA|5|The Soulmonger}.

items.name: Inherited flaw:
items.entry: "I am fearless and not afraid to take great risks."

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host's Força score becomes 23, unless it is already higher.

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host can use an action to turn {@condition invisible}. Anything the host is wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} as long as it is on the host's person. The effect ends if the host attacks, casts a spell, forces a saving throw, or deals damage.

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. It gains a climbing speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Inherited flaw:
items.entry: "I am risk-averse and a slave to routine."

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host can attune to one additional magic item. When Obo'laka leaves the host, all magic items to which the host is attuned are no longer attuned to it.

reward.name: Orzhov Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell imposar maledicció} or {@spell temor} spell. Alternatively, when una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast es queda a 0 punts de vida, you can use your reaction to have it drop to 1 hit point instead. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

items.name: Inherited flaw:
items.entry: "I bow before no one and expect others to do as I command."

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host can't be surprised, gains advantage on all Saviesa checks, and never takes damage from falling.

reward.name: Rakdos Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell corona de bogeria}, {@spell venjança dels inferns}, o {@spell esclatar} spell. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Selesnya Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell aura de curació} or {@spell convocar animals} spell. Alternatively, com a acció, you can give up to three creatures of your choice within 30 feet of you resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant fins el final del teu proper torn. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host can make one extra attack when taking the {@action Attack} action on its turn.

reward.name: Simic Charm
entries: When you activate this charm, you can cast the {@spell esperonar habilitat} (3rd-level version), {@spell engrandir/enxiquir}, o {@spell forma gasosa} spell. The charm vanishes after you activate it.

reward.name: Strawbundle's Charm
entries: While you have Strawbundle in your possession, this charm allows you to cast the {@spell eterietat} spell com a acció, no components required. After it is used three times, the charm vanishes.
The doll is a Tiny construct. Destroying the doll causes the child's soul within it to become trapped in {@adventure the Soulmonger|ToA|5|The Soulmonger}.

reward.name: The Blessed of Corellon
entries: Ever changing, mirthful, and beautiful, the primal elves could assume whatever sex they liked. When they bowed to Lolth's influence and chose to fix their physical forms, elves lost the ability to transform in this way. Yet occasionally elves are born who are so androgynous that they are proclaimed to be among the blessed of Corellon—living symbols of the god's love and of the primal elves' original fluid state of being. Many of Corellon's chief priests bear this blessing.

The rarest of these blessed elves can change their sex whenever they finish a long rest-a miracle celebrated by elves of all sorts except drow. (The DM decides whether an elf can manifest this miracle.) Dark elves find this ability to be terrifying and characterize it as a curse, for it could destabilize their entire society. If Corellon's blessing manifests in a drow, that elf usually flees to the surface world to seek shelter among those dedicated to Corellon.

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host's Constitució score becomes 23, unless it is already higher.

reward.name: Vlagomir's Spark
entries: You gain 1 foot of height every hour and become proportionately heavier until you stand 21 feet tall and weigh 7,700 pounds. When you are 9 feet tall, your Força becomes 19 unless it is already higher. For every 3 additional feet of height you gain, your Força increases by 1, to a maximum of 23. Armor and clothing you are wearing and weapons you are carrying magically increase in size to match your growth. If you are the recipient of a {@spell restabliment superior} spell or similar magic, this charm vanishes from you, and you immediately shrink back to normal size, along with any armor, clothing, and weapons in your possession.

items.name: Inherited flaw:
items.entry: "I act without concern for the well-being of others."

items.name: Power:
items.entry: The host can use an action to unleash a psionic assault on a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 16). Si falla, be {@condition atordit} until the end of the target's next turn.

reward.name: Yuan-Ti Purassang Transformation
entries: A human can be transformed into a yuan-ti purassang. The transformation can be undone only by a {@spell desig} spell or divine intervention. A character who survives it gains a random form of {@table indefinite madness} (see "{@book Madness|DMG|8|Madness}" in chapter 8 of the {@i Dungeon Master's Guide}). A human that undergoes and survives the ritual retains its traits and gains the following yuan-ti racial traits.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell esprai de verí}. Pots llançar el conjur {@spell amistat animal} an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Començant al nivell 3, you can also cast {@spell suggestió} with this trait. Once you cast it, no pots tornar a emprar-lo fins que acabis un descans llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Tens avantatge a tirades de salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

entries.name: Immunitat a Metzines
entries: Ets immune al dany de verí and the {@condition emmetzinat} condition.
